definition: Yuri Gagarin (1934-1968), Russian cosmonaut, first human in space
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.chinese: 這裏到處都充滿着向加加林致敬的痕跡。

sentences.english: Gagarin died in 1968, after crashing a MiG fighter during a training flight.
sentences.chinese: 加加林在1968年死於一次米格戰機試飛事故。

sentences.english: There are things we know conclusively about Yuri Gagarin's final moments.
sentences.chinese: 關於加加林最後的時刻，有幾件事是確知的。

sentences.english: It was very similar to feeling among Americans when Gagarin went into orbit.
sentences.chinese: 和加加林進入軌道時美國人的心情很相似。

sentences.english: At the same time, Gagarin became the first man to orbit the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，加加林成爲第一個繞地球軌道運行。

sentences.english: Gagarin had the great distinction of being the first man to go into space.
sentences.chinese: 加加林作爲第一個進入太空的人而聞名於世。

sentences.english: Gagarin would have been his replacement.
sentences.chinese: 加加林在這次任務中是他的替補。

sentences.english: Yuri Gagarin died in a plane crash in 1968.
sentences.chinese: 尤里加加林死於1968年的一次飛機墜毀事故。

sentences.english: One year earlier Gagarin died in a plane crash.
sentences.chinese: 一年前，加加林死於空難。

sentences.english: The mission, Gagarin suggested, should be postponed.
sentences.chinese: 加加林提議這次任務應該被推遲。

definition: Baikonur (Russian space launch site in Kazakhstan)
moon landing/to land on the moon
Eugene Cernan (1934-), US astronaut in Apollo 10 and Apollo 17 missions, "last man on the moon"
Soviet Union, 1922-1991/abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟|苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟[Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2]
